Change Log

Changes since 2.0 - Converted to .NET

  • Converted to .Net Framework.
  • Options are seperated into dialogs and menus.
  • Removed south view or map.

Changes since 1.5 - New features and bug fixes.

  • Rotate introduced.
  • Undo & Redo Command added.
  • Area to be mirrored is now highlighted
  • Symmetry lines now show at edges of the map and are consistent on the South Pole view.
  • Hitting Cancel on the File Open dialog will not now reload the file.
  • Trigger objects are now replicated to point at their corresponding target locations.

Changes since 1.4 - Small Updates.

  • Save Image, save a bitmap of what the North and South box contains.
  • Loading files is now easier because you can open "levl...dat" and ".dat" files now.

Changes since 1.3 - Enhancements to triggers, object orientation and move map.

  • Move map is easier with separate buttons for each direction.
  • Trigger colour is ignored. This makes sure that triggers remain Blue, otherwise they don't work.
  • The orientation of buildings and scenery is now mirrored eg If a Blue hut was pointing North, you get a Red hut pointing South.

Changes since 1.2 - Addition of Move Map

  • A function to reposition the map in the level file has been added. Note move function will not currently move referenced land locations within objects.
  • The registry updates created by default Microsoft VB code have been removed.
  • The mirror objects check box is now not unchecked or disabled when Show Objects is unchecked.
